item.title: Parsing in C with Advanced GCC Tricks
item.description: class: center, middle Parsing in C with Advanced GCC Tricks class: center, middle We will commit many sins; may the CS gods forgive us. Gotos You remember these right? int main() { goto a_label; printf("This won't be printed.\n"); a_label: printf("At our label!\n"); return 0; } $ ./a.out At our label! “infinitely abusable” - Kernighan & Ritchie Computed Gotos Your typical label: a_label: A pointer to anything:
